recommendations.recommendation: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
recommendations.implementation: Add onKeyDown handlers and proper tabIndex values

recommendations.recommendation: Provide descriptive labels for all form controls
recommendations.implementation: Use aria-label, aria-labelledby, or associated label elements

recommendations.recommendation: Use semantic HTML elements for better structure
recommendations.implementation: Replace generic divs with nav, main, section, article elements

recommendations.recommendation: Implement proper focus management in modals and navigation
recommendations.implementation: Trap focus in modals, return focus after close, manage route changes

recommendations.recommendation: Ensure sufficient color contrast ratios (4.5:1 for normal text)
recommendations.implementation: Use tools like WebAIM contrast checker, avoid color-only indicators

next_steps: Review and fix high-priority accessibility issues
Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Conduct user testing with assistive technology users
